name: In the Lost and Found
description:
Made for the 2021 Global Game Jam

You work at the Lost and Found, sorting through Objects, but your boss likes puzzles, so he requests items with Riddles on the Blackboard.

Solve the Riddle and place Objects in the cart.

WASD to move
Mouse to look around
Hold Left Mouse Button to hold onto Objects.
You can Jump with Space and Crouch with Control.

Art and textures - Kersti & Giancarlo
Music and design - Karl Erik
Programming - Sander

Music track rendition of Elliott Smith's "In the Lost and Found"
